content: start weighing the remaining yarn to see how far you re able to continue to be on the safe side start the bind-off when there s about 3 row worth of yarn left over as the bind-off requires more yarn than a standard row ⓒbeatemieslinger 2023 page3/4 baltic beach shawl by beate mieslinger contributions tag finished projects with #balticbeachstole on social media i offer my patterns for free as i have a day job i can only offer limited pattern support but i will try to help please contact me on ravelry or via the fediverse @fancityknits@troet cafe or send me an email if you love the pattern you can buy me a coffee - https //ko-fi com/fancityknits all money given to me will be donated ⓒbeatemieslinger 2023 page4/4
